enumerations.name: RamBlockStatusControlEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration type defines options for how the management of the ramBlock status is controlled. Aggregated by NvBlockNeeds.ramBlockStatusControl

literals.name: api
literals.description:
The ramBlock status is controlled via service interface by usage of the SetRamBlockStatus operation.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: nvRamManager
literals.description:
The ramBlock status is controlled exclusively by the Nv Ram Manager.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1
